command_buy_description:
Utilise pour acheter des structures qui te donneras CPS
Throw *{0}{1}* pour voir la liste des bâtiments 
Throw *{0}{1}* nombre pour acheter un bâtiment
command_deleteuser_description: Removes yourself from the game database
command_error_description: Default error message for unknown commands
command_help_description: Use to retrieve list of commands
command_info_description: Use to retrieve user profile and information
command_upgrade_description:
Use to upgrades that will boost you in different ways
Throw *{0}{1}* to see the list of upgrades
Throw *{0}{1} number* to buy an upgrade
